question.questionText: What process forms deltas? A. Gravity B. Erosion (C. Deposition) D. Decomposition. Explain how deltas form.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Earth materials erode and are carried by flowing water (a river). The earth materials form a delta when the materials are dropped off or deposited when the water stops flowing (at the mouth of a river).

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Water pushes sand to make a slope.
Deltas are formed by erosion and deposition.
Deltas form by the water wearing down the mouth and dragging it down.
